title: Thomas Rickner
content: Part of the team involved in the design and re-drawing of [Eldorado](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055154/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eldorado) for [The Font Bureau, Inc](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055154/http:/typophile.com/wiki/The%20Font%20Bureau%2C%20Inc)
author: Miss Tiffany
